contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 4, 2008 D Fife Charities Band Association Contest
Fife Charities Band Association Contest 1 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points) Fife Charities Band Association Contest fife-charities-band-association-contest
None
Adam Smith Theatre, Kirkcaldy, Fife, Scotland, UK No points awarded to Dysart Colliery - adjudication only
1st Prize (The Carnegie Trophy) Dalmellington 2nd Prize (The Hannaford Trophy) Kingdom Brass 3rd Prize (The John Reid Trophy) Clackmannan District Brass
Best 1st Section (The Barry, Ostlere & Shepherd Trophy) Clackmannan District Brass Best 2nd Section (The Barratt Trophy) City of Discovery Best 3rd Section (The Derek Wishart Trophy) Coalburn Silver Best 4th Section (The McKenna Trophy) Brass Sounds Inverclyde
Best Fife A Band (The Fife Miners Welfare Trophy) Kingdom Brass Best Fife B Band (The CISWO Trophy) Dunfermline Town
Winning Conductor (The Hutchison Rosebowl) Archie Hutchison
March Winners (The West Fife Ex-Servicemans Trophy) Dalmellington Hymn Tune Winners (The Rogerson Trophy) Kingdom Brass
Best Cornet (The Royal Oak Social Club Trophy) Solo Cornet, Kingdom Brass Best Horn (The James Cooney Memorial Trophy) Flugelhorn, Dalmellington Best Euphonium (The Sandy Cochrane Memorial Trophy) Dalmellington Best Trombone (The Charles McEwan Trophy) Dalmellington Best Bass Section (The David Wallace Memorial Trophy) Kingdom Brass
Youngest Player (The David Hughes Trophy) Scott Nicol, Brass Sounds Inverclyde
Nov. 30, 2009, 7:29 p.m. Nov. 7, 2011, 2:19 p.m.
1 Dalmellington Band Archie Hutchison The Year of the Dragon
2 Kingdom Brass Craig Anderson St. Magnus
